Betty Aberlin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Betty_Aberlin 0 Betty Aberlin (born December 30, 1942) is an American actress, poet, and writer. She is best known as Lady Aberlin on Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Betty_Aberlin ( born December_30 , 1942 ) is an_American_actress , poet , and writer . She is_best_known as Lady_Aberlin on Mister_Rogers '_Neighborhood .
